title: Executive Order 7460-Designating the Chairman of the United States Maritime Commission
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 201(a) of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 (49 Stat. 1985), I hereby designate Henry A. Wiley as Chairman of the United States Maritime Commission.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7460-Designating the Chairman of the United States Maritime Commission Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/356178
